interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Prodigy
Review Date: 2019/11/14
Categories: Science Fiction, Suspense, Cerebral, Mysterious
Product Description: ["When an unconventional psychologist takes on the case of a dangerous young genius, the two engage in a battle of wits. As the sessions continue, the psychologist make some shocking, supernatural discoveries, that could impact his patient's life."]
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Alex Haughey', 'Brian Vidal'], 'Producers': ['Alex Haughey'], 'Starring': ['Richard Neil', 'Savannah Liles', 'Jolene Andersen']}
Review Text: Not bad for a telepathic story. Well executed and acted. Definitely recommend.
Review Title: Pretty good movie
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

{'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Michôd'], 'Producers': ['Liz Watts', 'David Linde', 'David Michôd'], 'Starring': ['Robert Pattinson', 'Guy Pearce', 'Scoot McNairy']}
Disgusting! I couldn't even make it past the first 20mins. It was fine until this lady offered (Guy Pierce) to have sex with a young teenage boy. The way she said it was enough to make you want to puke. I will not be finishing this film.
Disgusting!
Dreams From My Real Father: A Story of Reds and Deception
Documentary
["Dreams from My Real Father chronicles Barack Obama's life journey in socialism starting with evidence that Obama's real father was Frank Marshall Davis, a Communist Party USA propagandist who indoctrinated Obama into a Marxist ideology during his formative years. Was the goat herding Kenyan father only a fairy tale to obscure a Marxist agenda, irreconcilable with American values?"]
{'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Joel Gilbert'], 'Producers': ['Joel Gilbert'], 'Starring': ['Barack Obama']}
Excellent documentary and features documents and other evidence to support their findings. Scary to think this very well could be what is going on in our White House.
A must watch!!!!
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Thomas Lucas'], 'Producers': ['Thomas Lucas', 'Johnny Friday', 'Alfredo Barroso', 'Jonathan Green'], 'Studio': ['MagellanTV']}
Amazing footage of marine life and excellent information on sharks
Beautifully done
{'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Sebastian Howard'], 'Producers': ['Batch Howard', 'Claude Barnes', 'Edith Dandenault', 'Anna Chen'], 'Studio': ['Syndicado']}
Wow what a challenging question. I had heard some of the arguments against milk before, but this was a great documentary. It still leaves the question, should we drink milk?
Great information!
{'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Barbara Kopple'], 'Producers': ['Carla Woods', 'Barbara Kopple', 'Glenn Rigberg', 'Hilary Birmingham'], 'Starring': ['Garo Armen', 'Steven Walker'], 'Studio': ['Gravitas']}
This was a great documentary. It really focused on how the FDA could play a vital role in saving lives, but instead is chooses to let people suffer. It's hard to believe that our country is so heartless and where the line blurs from helpful to harmful. This is a great documentary for everyone to watch, it really will open your eyes to how the government would rather let drugs that will save or help people sit forever instead of taking a stand to work with these families.
A MUST WATCH! Don't be fooled
{'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Bertram Verhaag'], 'Producers': ['Bertram Verhaag'], 'Starring': ['Percy Schmeiser'], 'Studio': ['Syndicado']}
Corporations are out of control and it's hard to believe how they are destroying so many industries, especially agriculture. This documentary is a great insight into the struggle to keep GMO out of our food and the hardship farmers are feeling because of it.
Excellent documentary
{'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Anja Dalhoff'], 'Producers': ['Gitte Randlov'], 'Starring': ['Michelle Mildwater']}
The impact that organ transplant makes in the world is really important. But you never really think about how thieves could convince you out of a kidney. Excellent documentary, great eye opener.
A must watch!
{'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jake Kasdan'], 'Producers': ['Matt Tolmach', 'William Teitler'], 'Starring': ['Dwayne Johnson', 'Kevin Hart', 'Jack Black'], 'Studio': ['SONY PICTURES ENTERTAINMENT', 'INC.']}
Such a great movie we had to buy for our family!
Five Stars
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Sarvan Singh'], 'Producers': ['Kelly Kalyan'], 'Starring': ['Renee Chowdhury', 'Ricky Singh'], 'Studio': ['Tiger Bunny Motion Pictures']}
Wow what a terrible short film. There is no reason to waste 7 mins of your life that you will never get back to watch this short. You'd be better off getting on YouTube. The story, actors, music, all of it just crap. I thought hey, it has terrible reviews, I bet there's some funny stuff, nope nothing. It is absolutely the stupidest waste of I've ever punished myself with. Good luck if you decide to give it a try.
Don't Watch It! Save yourself the 7 mins! You can't get the time back!

description: When an unconventional psychologist takes on the case of a dangerous young genius, the two engage in a battle of wits. As the sessions continue, the psychologist make some shocking, supernatural discoveries, that could impact his patient's life.
